name: MISSION
description: To have a vital and effective partnership with the Qatari community for us to be able to provide our health services in homes, businesses, schools, factories, institutions and other establishments

name: VISION
description: The development of health care and nursing services to cope up with the growing needs of a progressing country such as Qatar.Contribute to the improvement of health services for schools, companies, factories, institutions

name: VALUES
description: Excellence – Professionalism – Respect,Optimism – Responsibility – Flexibility, Quality service – Continuous learning and improvement,Teamwork – Trust – Respect
